item.title: Miracle Blue Agate Necklace M07
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
One of Miracle's most beautiful necklaces, The Blue Agate is based on one of the brand's most sophisticated designs. This is a necklace that hints at historic jewelry tradition, paying it a tribute in a way that is undeniably modern, incredibly stylish and elegant. The necklace is impressive with its detailing and is carrying an unmistakable sense of presence. One might infer with absolute confidence that this refined necklace will favorably complement a number of your stylish looks.

The post Miracle Blue Agate Necklace M07 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
One of Miracle’s most beautiful necklaces, The Blue Agate is based on one of the brand’s most sophisticated designs. This is a necklace that hints at historic jewelry tradition, paying it a tribute in a way that is undeniably modern, incredibly stylish and elegant. The necklace is impressive with its detailing and is carrying an unmistakable sense of presence. One might infer with absolute confidence that this refined necklace will favorably complement a number of your stylish looks.

Materials

Agate is a magnificent  stone that is believed to have been one of humanity’s earliest possessions. According to researchers, Agate was mined in Ancient Egypt as early as 3500 B.C. As per Agate’s properties, it is regarded as providing a harmonizing influence. It is believed to help with balancing of emotional, physical and intellectual endeavors, harmonizing the Ying and Yang forces of the universe. A soothing and calming stone, Agate is thought to bring great strength gradually. This stone is said to aid with the acceptances of oneself, building self confidence. It is also believed that Agate can improve concentration and analytical abilities, resulting in newfound practical solutions.

About Miracle

Miracle is a unique brand that is based in refined, sophisticated and feminine accessories. Accessories that combine a sense of jewelry tradition with notions of elegant, modern and contemporary jewelry. Truly a designer brand, Miracle seems to embody the commitment to a woman’s passion for outstanding accessories, creating undeniably beautiful pieces, from necklaces to earrings and bracelets. Miracle’s apt selection of favorite materials includes howlite, quartz, cat’s eye and agate. Taking a piece of Miracle’s jewelry into a hand, one can’t help but acknowledge the brand’s unmistakable original style that combines true refinement with sensual elegance.

The post Miracle Blue Agate Necklace M07 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
